scripts.build:staging: node generate-prerender-routes.js && node generate-sitemap.js && ng build --configuration=staging && cp dist/browser/index.csr.html dist/browser/index.html && echo '/*    /index.html   200' > dist/browser/_redirects && node compress-assets.js
scripts.build:prod: node generate-prerender-routes.js && node generate-sitemap.js && ng build --configuration=production && cp dist/browser/index.csr.html dist/browser/index.html && echo '/*    /index.html   200' > dist/browser/_redirects && node compress-assets.js
scripts.build:staging:ssr: node generate-prerender-routes.js && node generate-sitemap.js && ng build --configuration=staging && ng run demo:prerender:staging && node compress-assets.js
scripts.build:prod:ssr: node generate-prerender-routes.js && node generate-sitemap.js && ng build --configuration=production && ng run demo:prerender:production && node compress-assets.js
scripts.build:ssg: node generate-prerender-routes.js && ng build && ng run demo:prerender
scripts.build:ssg:prod: node generate-prerender-routes.js && ng build --configuration=production && ng run demo:prerender:production
scripts.performance:test: npm run build:prod && npx lighthouse https://quran-apps.itqan.dev --output json --output-path ./performance-results.json
